conditions.name: Down Syndrome (Trisomy 21)
conditions.description: A chromosomal condition caused by an extra copy of chromosome 21.
key_facts: Most common chromosomal condition
Can cause intellectual disability and developmental delays
Many individuals lead fulfilling, independent lives
Early intervention therapies can help development

conditions.name: Cystic Fibrosis
conditions.description: A genetic condition that affects the lungs and digestive system.
key_facts: Affects breathing and digestion
New treatments have dramatically improved outcomes
Many people with CF live into their 40s and beyond
Early detection allows for proactive treatment

conditions.name: Sickle Cell Disease
conditions.description: A blood disorder that affects hemoglobin in red blood cells.
key_facts: Can cause pain episodes and anemia
Treatments have improved significantly
Bone marrow transplant can be curative
Carrier status provides malaria resistance

conditions.name: Spinal Muscular Atrophy
conditions.description: A genetic condition that affects motor neurons and muscle strength.
key_facts: Affects muscle movement
New gene therapies have transformed treatment
Early detection is crucial for best outcomes
Zolgensma and Spinraza are breakthrough treatments

conditions.name: Edwards Syndrome (Trisomy 18)
conditions.description: A chromosomal condition caused by an extra copy of chromosome 18.
key_facts: Can cause serious health problems
Often detected during pregnancy
Severity varies widely
Support and resources are available

conditions.name: Patau Syndrome (Trisomy 13)
conditions.description: A chromosomal condition caused by an extra copy of chromosome 13.
key_facts: A serious chromosomal condition
Can cause heart defects and other health issues
Prenatal counseling is recommended

low_risk.meaning: The chance of the baby having this condition is significantly reduced

high_risk.meaning: Increased chance detected - this is NOT a diagnosis
high_risk.next_steps: Confirmatory testing recommended, speak with genetic counselor

carrier_positive.meaning: Mother carries a gene variant for a recessive condition
carrier_positive.next_steps: Fetal risk assessment will be performed automatically
